sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/1 and 2/2.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 5, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Due to limited snowfall trails are unable to be groomed at this time.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: This morning’s  snow  was the icing on the cake over a well layered and constructed base . Beautiful groom - well done Nubs crew ! LF 7

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Crispy cold at 1830 running fast in firm machine snow classic tracks. Toko blue gave great glide, skins did good on uphills.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 lifts, Space Worm and the rope tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled and tracked on Monday morning, and are in great shape.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's another great day to be on skis at Nub's Nob. Thanks to continuous temperatures below freezing along with the work of our Grooming Crew the snow surface continues to be top-notch. Today the temperature should reach 25 degrees with very light wind. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
